ComicInfo.Title: Resigned
ComicInfo.Summary: END OF AN ERA! WITCHBLADE reaches its landmark one hundred-fiftieth issue! The series reaches another landmark as long time writer RON MARZ and artist STJEPAN SEJIC put a final stamp on the series they helped define for the modern reader with their final issue.
ComicInfo.Characters: Lt. Phipps,Aphrodite IV,Sara Pezzini,Jackie Estacado,Witchblade,Danielle Baptiste,The Angelus,Ian Nottingham,Detective Gleason,Captain Peyroux
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: D-Tron,Imaginary Friends Studios,J. Scott Campbell,Michael Broussard,Michael Turner,Mike Choi,Rick Basaldua,Stjepan Šejić,Sunny Gho
